Body:
"""Test gpu flage without any host or module.
    """
with tmpdir.as_cwd():
    output = """Plotting GPU and CPU data.
Plotting all hosts in input file.
Plotting all modules in your input data.
Your file was saved as 'testpng.png' in the working directory.
"""
    result = cli_runner.invoke(cli, ['plot', '--csv={}'.format(data[
        'test.csv']), '--gpu', '--output-name=testpng', '--output-format=png'])
    assert result.exit_code == 0
    assert result.output == output
    assert os.path.exists('testpng.png')
